about_the_game:
Scrap Down is an action-packed 2D shooter arena game, set in an exciting space theme. The game features casual and fast-paced shooting mechanics that are easy to understand to players of all ages and skill levels.



The heart of Scrap Down lies in its dynamic and chaotic gameplay, where players pilot their own spaceship and dive into intense battles with friends or other players, using a variety of futuristic weapons and gadgets, keeping each match fresh and unpredictable.



The arenas are filled with obstacles and interactive elements that add to the strategic depth. Whether it's setting traps, leveling up your gears or using gadgets to take down your enemies, these features ensures that no two matches are ever the same.



Scrap Down offers vibrant graphics, engaging gameplay, and a perfect blend of competition and humor, Scrap Down is the go-to casual shooter game for those looking to enjoy fast-paced action and fun moments.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 (High Sierra)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (2.5 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or Apple M1 GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 (Catalina) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (2.7 GHz) or Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 560X, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 775M, or Apple M1 GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
